feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÃŠTES WIND WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 5:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -10.8°C
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. High 6 except plus 2 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to ice pellets or freezing rain in the afternoon and then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 except gusting to 110 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the afternoon. High 6 except plus 2 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries late in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
